values.title: Candace Bushnell
values.desc: Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with

values.title: Jodi Picoult
values.desc: I wondered what happened when you offered yourself to someone and they opened you only to discover you were not the gift they expected and they had to smile and nod and say thank you all the same

values.title: Amy Sedaris
values.desc: Dont leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later he may be with his real girlfriend

values.title: Mandy Hale
values.desc: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake  help us see we are worth so much more than were settling for

values.title: Charlaine Harris
values.desc: Its probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your exboyfriend because hes absolutely lethal

values.title: Greg Behrendt
values.desc: Busy is another word for asshole Asshole is another word for the guy youre dating

values.title: Bernard Branson
values.desc: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection

values.title: Mandy Hale
values.desc: Hope for love pray for love wish for love dream for lovebut dont put your life on hold waiting for love

values.title: Mandy Hale
values.desc: One of the best times for figuring out who you are  what you really want out of life Right after a breakup
